title: Nintendo Still Has Metroid Prime 4 Down as a Switch Game - IGN Daily Fix
description:
On today's Daily Fix:
Nintendo has outlined upcoming Nintendo Switch exclusives and still lists the long-absent Metroid Prime 4 as a Switch game. Nintendo saw huge revenue and profit gains off the back of the enormous success of Tears of the Kingdom and The Super Mario Bros. Movie. Capcom’s Resident Evil 2 remake has sold more copies than any other title in the horror franchise’s 27-year history, after passing 12.6 million cumulative lifetime sales across console and PC.

#IGN

title: The Kill Room - Official Trailer (2023) Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson, Maya Hawke
description:
Patrice Capullo (Uma Thurman) has a big problem, her art gallery isn’t making money. Gordon Davis (Samuel l. Jackson) has an even bigger problem, while arranging hits for the mob is lucrative, he and his”colleague” Reggie Pitt (Joe Manganiello) need a better way to launder their money. A chance introduction through Patrices’s drug dealer has the art world meet the underworld, and a plan is hatched.

The one hitch: Patrice needs something to sell. With that, Reggie taps into his inner artist and makes a painting which immediately “sells” for an incredibly high price. When the noteworthy price for this new mystery artist accidentally leaks, the art career of “The Bagman” is born, attracting attention and press, something his superiors in the underworld are very unhappy with.

title: Meg 2: The Trench Review
description:
Meg 2: The Trench reviewed by Matt Donato. Narrated by Mark Medina.

Meg 2: The Trench has all the excitement of fishing solo for two hours without a single bite. Wheatley is a shell of himself behind the camera, devoid of personality and originality. If you copy greed-driven subplots, underwater escape sequences, and helmet-imploding deaths from better movies, maybe don’t make it so obvious, especially when it seems like the studio overseers don’t care enough about delivering a sequel that carries individual value. Meg 2: The Trench is a terrible megalodon-sized blunder haplessly cobbled together using parts stripped from throughout genre history, all made impotent and dulled in far lesser hands.

title: Apex Legends Season 18: Revenant Rework Abilities Explained
description:
Apex Legends Season 18 Resurrection sees the huge rework of Revenant, major weapon changes, and gameplay updates. Resurrection launches August 8th so here’s everything you need to know to prepare, starting with Revenant’s rework.

#IGN #ApexLegends #Gaming

title: Warhaven: 9 Minutes of Hush Gameplay
description:
Warhaven was incredibly popular during the most recent Steam Next Fest so we hopped in with the team at Nexxon to play some for ourselves. This Warhaven Hush Gameplay features some of the new moves and a few killstreaks we thought we'd share. Did you play Warhaven? If so, what did you think?

#IGN #Gaming #Warhaven

title: Baldur's Gate 3: The First 23 Minutes of PC Gameplay (Max Settings - 4K 60FPS)
description:
Baldur's Gate 3's full release is finally here and we wanted to see how the game ran at max settings. This is the first minutes of Baldur's Gate 3 gameplay running on a AMD Ryzen 9 7950X3D CPU, and Nvidia 4090 24GB GPU. Here are the results at 4K 60fps.

#IGN #Gaming #BaldursGate3

title: Somerville - Official PlayStation Announcement Trailer
description:
Somerville will be available on PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 on August 31, 2023, and it is available now on PC and Xbox. Check out the latest trailer. 

In the wake of catastrophe, you must find the means to make your family whole again. Somerville is a Sci-Fi adventure grounded in the intimate repercussions of large-scale conflict.

title: Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart - PC vs PS5 & HDD Tested | IGN Performance Review
description:
The Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart PC release has been put to the test, and the big question looms about the SSD requirement and how important it is to allow the game to function as intended.  Nixxes have been invaluable to the porting of PS5 exclusives to PC. Now with Rift Apart they, and the PC platform, get the biggest challenge yet. Can you run this on a mechanical Hard Drive? What does it take to match and exceed PS5? How well does it scale above and below that? And what are the best settings to play this universe-hopping adventure? All that and more are included in our IGN Performance review.

Chapters
0:00 Introduction
0:46 RTX3080/5800X3D vs PS5 Fidelity VRR Performance test
5:57 RTX3080/5800X3D vs PS5 Performance RT VRR Performance test
8:30 RTX3080/5800X3D vs PS5 Maximum settings and VRAM
11:40 Hard Drive vs SSD testing
15:41 Steam Deck & Mid Range PC Testing & Recommended Settings
19:55 Matching PS5 settings and visual comparison
24:38 Summary

#IGN

title: Warhaven Hands-On Preview
description:
In a hands-on demo of upcoming the 16v16 free-to-play Warhaven, we found this massive warfare simulator to be satisfying, bloody, and utterly unhinged.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Lost Eidolons - Official Release Date Trailer
description:
Lost Eidolons is a tactical RPG developed by Ocean Drive Studio. Players will follow the journey of a diverse cast of characters, each with their own unique abilities and backstories, as they uncover the secrets of a world on the brink of change. Taking into account the game's complex combat system, strategic thinking and decision-making are necessary for a victory that could ultimately shape the fate of their characters and the world they inhabit. With over 20 playable characters and 10 classes to choose from, equip and train your allies to unlock new skills, spells, and passive abilities. Lost Eidolons is launching on August 24 for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series S|X.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Dicks: The Musical - Official Trailer (2023) Megan Thee Stallion, Nathan Lane, Bowen Yang
description:
Check out the trailer for Dicks: The Musical, an upcoming musical comedy movie starring Aaron Jackson, Josh Sharp, Megan Thee Stallion, Nathan Lane, Megan Mullally, and Bowen Yang as God.

Two self-obsessed businessmen (Aaron Jackson and Josh Sharp) discover they’re long-lost identical twins and come together to plot the reunion of their eccentric divorced parents.

The film is written by Aaron Jackson and Josh Sharp. It is directed by Larry Charles (Seinfeld, Borat).

Dicks: The Musical opens in theaters on September 29, 2023.

#IGN

title: Payday 3 - Official Gameplay Trailer
description: Payday 3 is a co-op heist first-person shooter developed by Starbreeze Studios. Take a look at the latest gameplay trailer taking place at a branch location of Secure Capital Bank somewhere in the bowels of New York City where Payday Gang members Dallas, Chains, Wolf, and Hoxton all set out to show the world they're still in business. Payday 3 is launching on September 21 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series S|X, Xbox Game Pass, and PC.

title: The Last Voyage of the Demeter - Exclusive Clip (2023) Javier Botet, Stefan Kapičić
description:
Based on a single chilling chapter from Bram Stoker’s classic novel Dracula, The Last Voyage of the Demeter tells the terrifying story of the merchant ship Demeter, which was chartered to carry private cargo—fifty unmarked wooden crates—from Carpathia to London.

Strange events befall the doomed crew as they attempt to survive the ocean voyage, stalked each night by a merciless presence onboard the ship. When the Demeter finally arrives off the shores of England, it is a charred, derelict wreck. There is no trace of the crew.

The Last Voyage of the Demeter opens in theaters on August 11.

title: Apex Legends - Official Resurrection Gameplay Trailer
description:
Apex Legends reigns in the latest update to the free-to-play battle royale shooter in the form of Apex Legends: Ressurection. The new update brings a new look and abilities to Revenant, who's unlocked for everyone and able to be permanently unlocked via a set of challenges. Utilize Revanant's new Passive, Tactical, and Ultimate abilities being Assassin's Instinct, Shadow Pounce, and Forged Shadows respectively. Alongside a new Ressurection Battle Pass, the Death Dynasty Collection Event will also be available in Battle Royale from August 8-15 and in Mixtape from August 15-22. Apex Legends: Ressurection launches on August 8 for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #ApexLegends

title: Baldur's Gate 3 - Official Launch Trailer
description:
Baldur’s Gate 3 is available now on PC, and it will also be available on PlayStation 5 on September 6, 2023. Watch the launch trailer to learn more about the story and get another look at the world of this RPG.

#IGN #Gaming #BaldursGate3

title: How the MCU can Solve its Kang Problem | Loki Season 2 Trailer Breakdown
description:
Loki Season 2 is right around the corner and Disney+ has dropped a brand new trailer for the upcoming series. Nestled in the teaser is what we think just may be the solution to Marvel Studios' Kang problem: Revona Renslayer.

Tom Hiddleston, Owen Wilson, Gugu Mbatha-Raw, Teresa DiMartino and the rest of the cast are back for the return of one of the biggest Disney+ shows to date in this Loki Season 2 teaser, which gives us a glimpse of Mobius and Loki back together again, as well as introducing Ke Huy Quan to the MCU! The Marvel Cinematic Universe will continue its multiversal adventures as the Multiverse Saga continues, but what's the fate of the Kang Dynasty? Jonathan Majors' legal troubles leave a lot of questions for the future of the big bad.

This official Loki season 2 trailer doesn't give us all of the answers, but we do have an idea about how Judge Renslayer can step in and solve Marvel's Kang problem.

#IGN #Loki #MCU

title: What Is Microsoft Bringing to Gamescom 2023? - IGN Daily Fix
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Microsoft is planning something BIG for gamescom 2023, like literally the biggest booth they've ever made. Lucky attendees to this year's show are going to get to play more than 30 new and upcoming games, plus hang out in a 300-seat theatre to watch a new Starfield presentation. In other news, Post Malone just bought The One Ring. No, not the one that was forged in Mount Doom by the Dark Lord Sauron, of which he poured all his malice into so he can control the other Rings of Power, but the super rare, one-of-a-kind The One Ring Magic the Gathering card. He hasn't disclosed how much he paid, but the original owner of the card is probably very happy. And we tell you how you can rate your favorite games to introduce them in the ultimate pantheon of greatness - the Pringles Icons! This episode is brought to you by Pringles.
